name: Madness
wikiSummary: The Madness Songfacts explains the song was inspired by an incident when a humbled Matt Bellamy had to go cap in hand to Goldie Hawn's house, after having a fight with his girlfriend Kate Hudson.
wikiText: The Madness Songfacts explains the song was inspired by an incident when a humbled Matt Bellamy had to go cap in hand to Goldie Hawn's house, after having a fight with his girlfriend Kate Hudson.
